name: Zephyr Warchief
text: You have mastered the art of war as practiced by the desert nomads. You are an expert at using speed and hit-and-run tactics for skirmishes and raids. Perhaps you are displaced from your original band, a grizzled veteran who now fights in foreign lands. You might be searching for a new band to lead or seeking to whip an existing group into shape. You could have been exiled from your tribe and now live as a rootless wanderer. Regardless of your past, your life brought you into contact with the ways of war, and from that experience, you became an aggressive and resourceful leader.

features.desertWind(zephyrWarchief)(11thLevel): Any ally who starts his or her turn within 5 squares of you gains a +2 bonus to speed when charging or running
features.warchief'sFavor(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, one ally within 5 squares of you can shift his or her speed and make a melee basic attack as a free action before or after the extra action
features.nomad'sBlessing(16thLevel): Whenever you shift, you can shift 1 extra square

flavorText: We are a scouring sandstorm, and we will sweep you away.
